name: Acer Nitro 27” Full HD Monitor
description: Experience vibrant visuals and smooth performance with the Acer Nitro 27” Full HD Gaming Monitor. Featuring a 1920×1080 IPS display, 165Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time, it delivers crisp detail and lag-free gameplay. The slim bezel design suits multi-monitor setups, while AMD FreeSync™, blue light filter, and flicker reduction ensure comfortable, tear-free viewing. Perfect for gaming, editing, or everyday work.

specs.Features: AMD FreeSync™, Blue Light Filter, Flicker-less Technology

name: CyberGear Vortex GX System Unit
description: The CyberGear Vortex GX System Unit delivers top-tier performance and style with a 12th Gen Intel Core i7, 16GB DDR4 RAM, and 512GB NVMe SSD for fast multitasking and load times. Featuring an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 for smooth, stunning visuals and an RGB tempered glass case with efficient cooling, it’s perfect for gaming, content creation, and professional work.

specs.Connectivity: Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.0, Multiple USB Ports, HDMI, DisplayPort

name: Logitech G502 Gaming Mouse
description: The Logitech G502 Gaming Mouse offers precision, speed, and customization for serious gamers. Featuring a 25K HERO sensor for ultra-accurate tracking, 11 programmable buttons, and adjustable weights, it adapts perfectly to your playstyle. With LIGHTSYNC RGB lighting and a durable, ergonomic design, the G502 delivers comfort and performance for both casual and competitive gaming.

name: Razer BlackShark V2 Headset
description: The Razer BlackShark V2 Gaming Headset offers immersive sound and comfort for long gaming sessions. Featuring THX 7.1 Surround Sound, custom-tuned 50mm drivers, and a detachable noise-cancelling microphone, it delivers clear audio and communication. The lightweight design with memory foam ear cushions ensures comfort, while the advanced passive noise cancellation blocks out distractions, making it perfect for competitive gaming.

specs.Compatibility: PC, Mac, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

name: CodeGear Mechanical Keyboard
description: Elevate your typing and gaming experience with the CodeGear Mechanical Keyboard. Featuring high-precision mechanical switches, customizable RGB lighting, and durable keycaps, this keyboard delivers both speed and comfort. Its ergonomic design ensures extended comfort during long sessions, while programmable keys let you tailor every action to your workflow or gameplay. Built for performance, reliability, and style, the CodeGear Mechanical Keyboard is the ultimate tool for gamers, coders, and enthusiasts alike.

name: Pokemon: Gengar Mouse Pad
description: This Gengar-themed mouse pad is a functional and stylish accessory for any Pokémon fan's desk. It features vibrant, high-quality Gengar artwork on a smooth, low-friction surface for precise mouse control. The pad includes a non-slip rubber base and is available in various sizes, including extended desk mat versions. It's an ideal combination of comfort, performance, and eye-catching Pokémon flair.

specs.Dimensions: Available in multiple sizes (e.g., 9.8 x 7.9 inches, 31.5 x 11.8 inches)
specs.Features: Non-slip base, stitched edges for durability
specs.Compatibility: Works with all mouse types (optical, laser)

name: C90 Pro Webcam
description: A high-definition webcam designed for clear and stable video calls, streaming, and online meetings. It delivers sharp 1080p resolution, autofocus, and built-in microphone for crisp audio. Its plug-and-play setup makes it compatible with most laptops, PCs, and conferencing apps. Ideal for remote work, online learning, or live streaming.

name: Opkall Speakers
description: The Opkall Speakers deliver high-quality audio with deep bass and clear treble, making them perfect for music, movies, and gaming. Their sleek design fits seamlessly into any setup, while Bluetooth connectivity allows for easy pairing with devices. With built-in controls and a compact form factor, these speakers are both stylish and functional.

name: Razer Microphone
description: The Razer Microphone is a high-quality USB microphone designed for gamers and streamers. It features a cardioid pickup pattern for clear voice capture, customizable RGB lighting, and a built-in pop filter to reduce unwanted noise. With its plug-and-play setup, it's compatible with most devices and software, making it easy to use for any streaming or recording setup.

name: Cooling Pad
description: The Cooling Pad is designed to keep your laptop or gaming console cool during intense use. With its ergonomic design and adjustable fan speeds, it provides optimal airflow and comfort. The pad is lightweight and portable, making it easy to use at home or on the go.

name: USB Hub
description: The USB Hub is a versatile accessory that expands your device's connectivity options. With multiple USB ports, it allows you to connect various peripherals such as keyboards, mice, and external drives simultaneously. Its compact design makes it easy to carry, while plug-and-play functionality ensures quick and hassle-free setup.

name: Adata External HDD
description: The Adata External HDD offers high-capacity storage in a portable design, making it perfect for backing up important files or expanding your device's storage. With USB 3.0 connectivity, it provides fast data transfer speeds and is compatible with both Windows and Mac systems. Its durable casing ensures that your data is protected on the go.

name: Iphone 16 pro max
description: The iPhone 16 Pro Max is Apple's latest flagship smartphone, featuring a stunning 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance, and an advanced camera system with ProRAW and ProRes video capabilities. With 5G support, improved battery life, and a sleek design, it's the ultimate device for users who demand the best.

specs.Camera System: Triple 12MP cameras with ProRAW and ProRes

name: PS5
description: The PlayStation 5 (PS5) is Sony's latest home gaming console, offering cutting-edge performance with a custom SSD for ultra-fast load times, a powerful GPU for stunning graphics, and a new DualSense controller with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers. It supports 4K gaming, ray tracing, and a vast library of games, making it a must-have for gamers seeking an immersive experience.

specs.Connectivity: Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.1, USB Type-C, USB Type-A

name: Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch is a versatile gaming console that can be used as a handheld device or connected to a TV for a traditional gaming experience. It features a 6.2-inch touchscreen, detachable Joy-Con controllers, and access to a vast library of games, including popular titles like The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild and Animal Crossing: New Horizons. With its unique hybrid design, the Switch offers flexibility and fun for gamers of all ages.

name: Pokemon Scarlet
description: Pokémon Scarlet is an exciting addition to the Pokémon series, offering players a new adventure in a vibrant open-world setting. With new Pokémon to discover, innovative gameplay mechanics, and a captivating storyline, it provides an immersive experience for both new and returning players. The game features stunning graphics, dynamic weather systems, and multiplayer options, making it a must-play for fans of the franchise.

specs.Features: Open-world exploration, New Pokémon species, Dynamic weather system

name: The Last of Us
description: The Last of Us is a critically acclaimed action-adventure game that follows the journey of Joel and Ellie in a post-apocalyptic world. With its gripping narrative, emotional depth, and intense gameplay, it offers a unique experience that explores themes of survival, trust, and humanity. The game features stunning visuals, realistic character animations, and a hauntingly beautiful soundtrack, making it a standout title in the gaming industry.

specs.Features: Narrative-driven gameplay, Stealth mechanics, Crafting system

name: Steam Deck
description: The Steam Deck is a powerful handheld gaming device developed by Valve, designed to run PC games from the Steam library. It features a custom AMD APU, a 7-inch touchscreen display, and a control layout similar to traditional game consoles. With its ability to run a full Linux OS and access to the Steam store, it offers gamers the flexibility to play their favorite titles on the go.
